critique: The document is an executive order transferring policy functions related to federal management from the Administrator of General Services to the Director of the Office of Management and Budget. It also amends a previous executive order regarding positions in the Executive Schedule. The order itself doesn't directly address issues of ideological tilt, immigration, security vs. liberty, economic regulation, or social inclusion. However, the transfer of power to the Office of Management and Budget could be seen as a slight shift towards stronger federal control.
